item.title: White Windows 10 Background
item.description: For my last post I wanted a white background for my screenshot. To do it, I found the answer in this post. Run ‚ÄúRun‚Äù üôÇ (or WIN + R) Enter command below‚Ä¶ Select white background! control /name Microsoft.Personalization /page pageWallpaper

item.title: Unity .NET 3.5 Framework Issue
item.description:
• I just wanted to write down my solution to an issue we were having at my university with getting .NET 3.5 framework installed.

The Issue

When loading C# scripts from Unity into Visual Studio, we would get ‚ÄúThe C# project ‚Äúxxx‚Äù is targeting ‚Äú.NETFramework, Version=v3.5,Profile=Unity Subset v3.5‚Ä≥, which is not installed on this machine‚Äù. So obviously, we just install .NET 3.5 right?

item.title: Windows Picture and Fax Viewer Registry
item.description: Hi! Just pasting this¬†little .reg code to enable Windows Picture and Fax Viewer in the newer versions of Windows. WindowsPictureAndFaxViewer.zip

item.title: Intro to Photogrammetry
item.description: Another awesome tool that is available for independent game developers is Photogrammetry. This takes real world objects and put them into formats such as OBJ, FBX, etc so that you can use on software such as 3dsmax and Mudbox which can then end up finally in Unity or other game engines!

item.title: WordPress Site Started
item.description: Thanks for stopping by! This is my WordPress site! I‚Äôll do my best to maintain a presence on the internet! Hopefully the posts that follow do not only inspire, but also act as a tips and tricks guide to do certain things! Wish me luck, and I hope you find your way as well!

item.title: Sonic the Hedgehog in 3D Studio Max
item.description: Here is a Time Lapsed Video of me modeling, rigging, and rendering Sonic the Hedgehog in 3ds Max (1 second = 1 minute).
